pr_title: Add GitHub action to generate code report #968

timeline.bodyText: Runs every Sunday at midnight. For other reviewer's benefit. :)
timeline.author: prathasirisha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+# This workflow will build a Java project with Maven
+# For more information see: https://help.github.com/actions/language-and-framework-guides/building-and-testing-java-with-maven
+
+name: Coverage Report
+
+on:
+  schedule:
+    - cron: '0 0 * * 0'

timeline.bodyText: I think we can remove extra blank lines? Line 12, Line 14.
timeline.author: prathasirisha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+# This workflow will build a Java project with Maven
+# For more information see: https://help.github.com/actions/language-and-framework-guides/building-and-testing-java-with-maven
+
+name: Coverage Report
+
+on:
+  schedule:
+    - cron: '0 0 * * 0'
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+

timeline.bodyText:
In other GitHub action yaml files, we have java-version configured as a variable that gets used in line number 17 and 20.
Though what you have works, can you make it consistent with other yaml files? This is just a  personal preference.
timeline.author: prathasirisha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+# This workflow will build a Java project with Maven
+# For more information see: https://help.github.com/actions/language-and-framework-guides/building-and-testing-java-with-maven
+
+name: Coverage Report
+
+on:
+  schedule:
+    - cron: '0 0 * * 0'
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+
+    steps:
+      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Set up JDK 1.8

timeline.bodyText:
@GracianoR I could be wrong, but I expected a variable definition like this for this to work.
matrix:
os: [ubuntu-latest]
java-version: [8]
See example here - line 12-14
timeline.author: prathasirisha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+# This workflow will build a Java project with Maven
+# For more information see: https://help.github.com/actions/language-and-framework-guides/building-and-testing-java-with-maven
+
+name: Coverage Report
+
+on:
+  schedule:
+    - cron: '0 0 * * 0'
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Set JDK ${{ matrix.java-version }}

timeline.message:
Add GitHub action to generate code report. Closes #968

Signed-off-by: GracianoR <rodrigo.graciano@bnymellon.com>
